audioText: L'environnement militaire est très différent de la vie civile normale selon les témoignages.
question: How is the military environment compared to normal civilian life?
options: It is very different from normal civilian life
It is exactly the same as civilian life
It is slightly similar to civilian life
It is better than civilian life
explanation: The text states 'L'environnement militaire est très différent de la vie civile normale selon les témoignages' - The military environment is very different from normal civilian life according to testimonies. 'Militaire' means military, 'différent' means different, and 'témoignages' means testimonies.
